alert.note: Alert for Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:00AM EDT until April 05 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT FOR KALAMAZOO COUNTY... At 1059 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Level Park-Oak Park to near Marcellus, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Vicksburg... Galesburg... Mattawan... Schoolcraft... Climax... Richland... Comstock Northwest... Kalamazoo-Battle Cre... Westwood... Gull Lake... Fulton... Augusta... Oshtemo... Comstock... Scotts... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
